name: bj-equsal
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:

comment: Shorter proof of ~ equsal . (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2018.) Proof modification is discouraged to avoid using ~ equsal , but "min */exc equsal" is ok. (Proof modification is discouraged.)
